title: Available 1 Bed 1 Bath
posting_body: ['Austin, 78703', 'Bowie Street', '$3223', '1 Bedroom', 'This apartment has dark oak or walnut hardwood flooring in the living area and the kitchen, carpet in the bedroom(s), and tile in the kitchen.', 'The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, marble, quartz, or granite countertops, pantry, wine rack, white, walnut, or wenge cabinetry, polished chrome hardware, glass mosaic or porcelain backsplash, gooseneck kitchen faucets, fridge with water and ice dispensers, undermount sinks, and a dishwasher.', 'There is central AC and heat and in-unit laundry.', 'Unit amenities include electronic entry doors, linen cabinets, floor-to-ceiling windows, vanity mirrors, storage closets, rainwater shower-heads, soaking tubs, solar window shades, solid core doors, and walk-in closets with wooden shelving and built-in show shelving.', 'Select units have built-in desks and cabinetry and private terraces.', 'Wheelchair access.', 'Community amenities include fitness center, concierge, elevators, outdoor sundeck with fire pit, grilling area, and seating, club-room with TVs, dog park, dog grooming room, coffee bar, conference area, community bikes, paddle board, kayaks, bike storage and maintenance room, controlled access, vehicle charging stations, online payments, guest room, catering kitchen, and pool.', 'Pets welcome.', 'Garage parking for additional monthly fee.', 'A seven minute drive to Interstate 35.', 'Short term lease options.', 'PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING, ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.', '***Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term***', 'Contact Agent:', 'Dave Burroughs', 'Independent Agents Austin TX', 'show contact info', 'Follow us on Twitter @RentalBeast', 'Find us on Facebook: <URL>']
